data.text: You people of Judah who ought to be ashamed,
Yahweh is extremely angry with you,
All you people in Judah who are humble,
And terrible things will happen to you people of Philistia who live near the sea,
The land of Philistia near the sea will become a pasture,
The people of Judah who ◄survive/are still alive► will possess that land.
The Commander of the armies of angels, the God to whom we Israeli people belong, says this:
So now, as surely as I live, I will destroy Moab and Ammon
The people of Moab and Ammon will get what they deserve for being proud,
Yahweh will cause them to be terrified
Yahweh says that he will also slaughter the people of Ethiopia.
Yahweh will punish [IDM] and destroy Assyria,
Flocks of sheep and herds of cattle and many kinds of wild animals will lie down there.
The people of Nineveh were previously happy and proud,
